title: Online Intensive Course Based on Textbook Analysis for Enhancing Advanced English Reading Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English grammar and vocabulary, with simple sentence comprehension skills
context.additional_context: College entrance exam preparation reading training focused on social studies terminology in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can read academic and professional English texts at a speed of 150 words per minute.
Learners can analyze the relationship between topic sentences and supporting sentences in complex sentence structures with 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply a five-step academic text summarization process: identifying the main idea → extracting keywords → analyzing structure → reconstructing core logic → paraphrasing.

resources: Social studies English academic text database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
